name: Shame Bird
description:
You are close to entering the craziest and most dangerous adventure of all time.

****

In a future not too far, greed and tyranny consumed our civilization. In the midst of this chaos comes a new hope. Shame Bird, a scientist as bright as crazy, is waging a crusade against the forces of evil.

Fly with our hero through dangerous paths and full of pitfalls. You need to be very quick and agile on this journey.

Disarming the bombs.
Dodge mines.
Escape the missiles!

Each burst balloon Shame Bird is closer to the goal!

****
